duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and organize daily care and treat clients with respect and compassion
Monitor and supervise clients at all times
Identify clients’ needs and prepare them for medical IV and IM procedures by following instructions from doctors or other professionals
Provide emotional or psychological support when needed
Act in emergency situations in accordance with professional standards and procedures
Maintain equipment and supplies in inventory
Schedule appointments and document hours worked and medical chart notes
Other duties as assigned by supervisor
